channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. Stock Indexes Slip After CPI Inflation Comes In a Touch Hot
item.description: Stocks inched lower at the open. Investors are paying close attention both to the labor market, and to progress in taming inflation, given the implica...

item.title: 7-Eleven's parent company cuts full-year earnings forecast, presses ahead with restructuring
item.description: The news comes as the Japanese retail group resists a takeover attempt by Canada's Alimentation Couche-Tard.

item.title: Dollar Strengthens on Inflation, Labor Data
item.description: The dollar strengthened after the latest readings on U.S. inflation and jobless claims, which bolstered bets on a moderate pace of interest-rate cuts ...

item.title: Samsung posts disappointing third-quarter profit guidance as it grapples with AI chips
item.description: Samsung posts worse-than-expected guidance for third quarter

item.title: PepsiCo trims revenue outlook as North American snacking, key international markets lag
item.description: PepsiCo lowered its full-year outlook for organic revenue but reiterated its forecast for its earnings growth.

item.title: Treasury Yields Rise on Inflation, Labor Data
item.description: Treasury yields rose after both U.S. inflation and jobless claims climbed higher than expected.

item.title: Delta sales guidance disappoints, CEO says airline expects lower demand around the election
item.description: Delta Air Lines expects to grow earnings in the fourth quarter, thanks to resilient travel demand and strong bookings for year-end holidays.

item.title: Social Security Is Giving Retirees a 2.5% Increase, the Smallest Raise in Years
item.description: Inflation has cooled, but the cost of living in retirement remains high.

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Lower Ahead of Storage Data
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures were lower for a fifth straight session, with the market attentive to demand prospects after Hurricane Milton knocked out pow...

item.title: GM expects 2025 earnings to be similar to this year's despite industry headwinds
item.description: The Detroit automaker's targeted adjusted earnings before interest and taxes this year is between $13 billion and $15 billion, or $9.50 and $10.50 per...
